titlestmt.titleproper: Proofs and Evidences of Bursaries to the College of Edinburgh

did.unittitle: Proofs and Evidences of Bursaries to the College of Edinburgh

physdesc.label: Extent and Medium of the Unit of Description

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Transcripts of Edinburgh Town Council records relating to bursaries to the Town College (now the University of Edinburgh).

custodhist.head: Archival History
custodhist.p: This has been in the custody of Edinburgh University Library since XXXX.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Received by Edinburgh University Library from Robert Johnston in XXXX.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Reproduction
userestrict.p: Applications for permission to quote should be sent to the Director of Collections. Reproduction subject to usual conditions: educational use and condition of documents.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Records of the University Factor (Ref: EUA IN1/ADS/FAC) contain other transcripts and original legal documents relating to bursaries etc., particularly pre-1964.
Records of the University Secretary (Ref: EUA IN1/ADS/SEC) contain documentation relating to more recent bursaries)
